pageContent: Background: A better understanding of how cancer treatments affect patient's employment may help patients and physicians make more informed choices between treatment alternatives. This study examined the number of days employed patients undergoing treatment for either breast or prostate cancer were absent from their jobs.

metaData.source:
High-resolution magic angle spinning 1H MRS in prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/23529951/
